params._weight: Weight of the token in the pool

returns._0: amounts Amount array of user's lp in each generation of lp token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newWeight: New weight of the token in the pool

addPool(address).notice: Register a new famring pool for priority pool

addToken(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Register Pri-LP token         Called when new generation of PRI-LP tokens are deployed         Only called from a priority pool

depositFromPolicyCenter(uint256,address,.notice: Deposit from Policy Center         No need for approval

supportedToken(uint256,address).notice: Check whether a token is supported in a certain pool

updateRewardSpeed(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Update reward speed when new premium income         Only called from a priority pool

updateWeight(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Update the weight of a token in a given pool         Only called from a priority pool

userdoc.notice: Weighted Farming Pool         Weighted farming pool support multiple tokens to earn the same reward         Different tokens will have different weights when calculating rewards         Native token premiums will be transferred to this pool         The distribution is in the way of "farming" but with multiple tokens         Different generations of PRI-LP-1-JOE-G1         About the scales of variables:         - weight            SCALE         - share             SCALE         - accRewardPerShare SCALE * SCALE / SCALE = SCALE         - rewardDebt        SCALE * SCALE / SCALE = SCALE         So pendingReward = ((share * acc) / SCALE - debt) / SCALE
